document.full_text: arab countries appealed to the united nations on saturday to impose a no-fly zone on libya as government troops backed by warplanes fought to drive rebels from remaining strongholds in western libya.
document.title: arab states back libya no-fly zone against gaddafi
lines_and_colors: arab countries appealed to the united nations on saturday to impose a no-fly zone on libya as government troops backed by warplanes fought to drive rebels from remaining strongholds in western libya.
